text: Alexander Hislop (born on 1807, Duns, died on 13 March 1863 at Arbroath) was a pastor of the Free Church of Ecosse. He criticized the Roman Catholic Church. He was an editor of the journal The Guardian. His father was Stephen Hislop (died on 1837) a mason and an Elder of the Relief churchhttps://www.archive.org == References == Category:1807 births Category:1863 deaths Category:Scottish Christian clergy
title: Alexander Hislop
